Check out the live demo: Green Energy Company Astro Template


ð¨ Description

This is a modern, responsive Astro theme designed for social media marketing agencies. It features a sleek design with sections for solutions, services, features, brands, and more, making it perfect for agencies looking to showcase their expertise and attract potential clients.


ð§ Technologies & Features

- Built with Astro for fast, efficient static site generation

- Styled using Tailwind CSS for rapid, customizable styling

- Responsive design that looks great on desktop and mobile devices

- Includes sections for:

  - Hero banner

  - Solutions overview

  - Services overview

  - Customer Testimonials

  - Benefits

  - Featured Products

  - Call-to-Action
